mapper.select: SELECT c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c, dev.name AS dev_name, dev.mark, tag.id tag_id, tag.type AS tag_type, tag.name AS tag_name FROM (SELECT devision.id,devision.cover_id,devision.devset_id,devision.mark, ds.name FROM devision INNER JOIN devision_set ds on ds.id = devision.devset_id WHERE ds.name = #{devision} AND devision.mark >= #{mark} ORDER BY devision.mark DESC LIMIT #{page} , #{size}) AS dev INNER JOIN cover c ON c.id = dev.cover_id INNER JOIN cover_tags ct ON ct.cover_id = c.id INNER JOIN tag ON tag.id = ct.tag_id WHERE c.district = #{district} and c.status = 0

SELECT base.*, t.id tag_id, t.type tag_type, t.name tag_name FROM (SELECT c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c FROM cover AS c WHERE c.price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice} AND c.district = #{district} AND c.title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%') LIMIT #{page} , #{size}) AS base INNER JOIN cover_tags ct ON ct.cover_id = base.cover_id INNER JOIN tag t ON ct.tag_id = t.id

SELECT c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c, tag.type AS tag_type, tag.name AS tag_name FROM cover c LEFT JOIN cover_tags AS ct ON ct.cover_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tag ON ct.tag_id = tag.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c, tag.type AS tag_type, tag.name AS tag_name FROM cover c LEFT JOIN cover_tags AS ct ON ct.cover_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tag ON ct.tag_id = tag.id WHERE c.title like concat('%',#{title},'%');

SELECT d.id, c.id cover_id, ds.name dev_name, ds.type dev_type, ds.sort dev_sort, d.mark, dp.type param_type, dp.name param_name, dp.data param_data, dp.des param_des, dp.must, dp.devision_id FROM devision d inner join devision_set ds on ds.id = d.devset_id inner join cover c ON c.id = d.cover_id inner join devision_params dp ON dp.devision_id = d.id WHERE ds.type = #{devType} AND c.id = #{coverId}

SELECT d.id, d.cover_id, ds.name dev_name, ds.icon1, ds.icon2, ds.type dev_type, ds.sort dev_sort, ds.des dev_des, ds.footerDes footer_des, d.mark, ds.des dev_des FROM devision d LEFT JOIN cover c ON c.id = d.cover_id LEFT JOIN devision_set ds ON ds.name = d.name WHERE c.id = #{coverId} AND ds.type != 0 ORDER BY ds.sort

SELECT c.id c_id, m.id m_id, m.branch, m.des m_des, m.json_content, m.name m_name, m.sort m_sort, m.status m_status FROM cover c LEFT JOIN devision d ON d.cover_id = c.id LEFT JOIN module m ON m.devision_id = d.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND d.name = #{devisionName}

SELECT c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c, ROUND(6378.138 * 2 * ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((c.latitude * PI() / 180 - #{latitude} * PI() / 180) / 2), 2) + COS(c.latitude * PI() / 180) * COS(#{latitude} * PI() / 180) * POW(SIN((c.longitude * PI() / 180 - #{longitude} * PI() / 180) / 2), 2))) * 1000) AS distance FROM eagleserver.cover AS c order by district asc limit 5
SELECT q.*, qo.id option_id, qo.content, qo.checked, qo.tags FROM Question q LEFT JOIN QuestionOption qo ON qo.question_id = q.id ORDER BY q.id

SELECT u.id user_id, u.nick_name, u.gender, u.open_id, c.id cover_id, c.address, c.des, c.district, c.img, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.price, c.project, c.project_district, c.status, c.title, c.transmit_c, c.view_c, t.id tag_id, t.type tag_type, t.name tag_name FROM mini_user u JOIN cover_collection uc ON u.id = uc.user_id JOIN cover c ON c.id = uc.cover_id JOIN cover_tags ct ON ct.cover_id = c.id JOIN tag t ON ct.tag_id = t.id WHERE u.open_id = #{openId} and uc.status=0
